title: ‘If I Get Bored I Won’t Last Too Long’: Tadej Pogačar on Reinvention and His Future in Cycling
content:
Tour de France champion Pogačar speaks on eve of Critérium du Dauphiné, talking Vingegaard, Evenepoel, reinvention and form.

Read the full article at ‘If I Get Bored I Won’t Last Too Long’: Tadej Pogačar on Reinvention and His Future in Cycling on Velo.
author: sstokes
